title.subHeading: With the company officially becoming operational in 2015, we aim to create unmatched positive relationships with our valued customers and help them with any electrical problem.

historyCards.title: Our Company
historyCards.description: Founded with a mission to deliver top-quality painting services, Unitus Painting quickly earned a reputation for reliability and attention to detail. Over the years, we have expanded our expertise across Canada, serving homes, businesses, and large-scale developments with the same dedication to excellence.

historyCards.title: Our Mission
historyCards.description: We aim to exceed client expectations with every job, offering expert service, quality work, and competitive pricing for both residential and industrial painting needs.

timelineItems.description: Unitus Painting is founded, focusing on high-quality residential and commercial painting services
Expansion into large-scale commercial and industrial painting across Canada
Recognition as a trusted industry leader in residential, strata, and industrial painting services
Further expansion of services, with a focus on high-rise buildings, warehousing, and hospitality sectors, reinforcing their role as a premier painting contractor across the nation
